about.title: About SmartHub Travel
about.missionText: We believe everyone deserves affordable travel. SmartHub Travel reveals the hidden savings in hub routing, helping you explore the world without breaking the bank.
about.step2Text: See direct vs hub route pricing
about.step3Text: Book the smarter route and save
about.missionDesc1: Travel should never be limited by budget constraints. SmartHub Travel exists to democratize air travel by revealing the hidden savings in hub-based routing. We analyze thousands of routes daily to surface opportunities that traditional booking platforms overlook.
about.missionDesc2: By connecting travelers with world-class hub airports, we help you experience more destinations, for less money, without sacrificing comfort or convenience.

values.passionDesc: We believe travel transforms lives and should be accessible to everyone.
values.globalDesc: We leverage worldwide hub networks to find the best connections.
values.focusDesc: Every recommendation is designed to maximize your travel budget.

hubDescriptions.DXB: One of the world's busiest airports, Dubai International offers excellent connections to Asia, Europe, and Africa with world-class facilities.
hubDescriptions.SIN: Award-winning airport known for its stunning architecture, gardens, and exceptional transit experience.
hubDescriptions.IST: Strategic gateway between Europe and Asia with competitive pricing on Turkish Airlines connections.
hubDescriptions.DOH: Ultra-modern hub with Qatar Airways offering premium connections worldwide.
hubDescriptions.LHR: Europe's busiest airport with extensive global connections.
hubDescriptions.FRA: Major European hub with efficient connections via Lufthansa.
hubDescriptions.JFK: Major transatlantic hub with connections to all US destinations.
hubDescriptions.HND: Convenient Tokyo airport with excellent Asia-Pacific connections.
hubDescriptions.LAX: Pacific gateway with strong connections to Asia and Oceania.

hubShortSummaries.DXB: Strategic crossroads between East and West with unbeatable savings and luxury transit.
hubShortSummaries.SIN: The world's best transit experience. You'll actually want a longer layover here.
hubShortSummaries.IST: Strategic gateway with incredible Turkish hospitality and massive global reach.
hubShortSummaries.DOH: Ultra-modern luxury hub offering some of the fastest connections to the Indian subcontinent.
hubShortSummaries.LHR: Essential transatlantic gateway with one of the world's most extensive route networks.
hubShortSummaries.FRA: Efficient German precision hub, perfect for quick connections across Europe.
hubShortSummaries.JFK: The primary gateway to the Americas, offering endless domestic and regional connections.
hubShortSummaries.HND: Clean, efficient, and located right in the heart of Tokyo for a perfect layover.
hubShortSummaries.LAX: Dynamic Pacific gateway connecting you effortlessly to Oceania and the West Coast.
